content.rendered:
New Patient Specials

New Patient Specials

At Gardena Dental Group, we love welcoming new patients of all ages to our office! We offer all new patients a free exam and x-rays, so you can meet our friendly staff and dentists, and find out the best ways to care for your smile. We hope you take advantage of some of our great new patient specials below!

Our Latest Specials

New Patient Special Offer

Free Initial Dental Examination with X-Rays, and a free ortho consultation.

*Does not include cleaning. We do not accept/transfer outside X-Rays.

New Patient Cosmetic Special

15% off cosmetic treatment and a free Sheer White take-home bleaching kit after treatment completion.*

*Value up to $399, not to be combined with other offers. for new patients.
